statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ 6 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
